greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Height of n-th term in Recamán's sequence A005132.
comment: The height of a term in A005132 = number of addition steps - number of subtraction steps to produce it.
Partial sums of A160357. - _Allan C. Wechsler_, 08 Sep 2019
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100000
Nick Hobson, Python program for this sequence
N. J. A. Sloane, FORTRAN program for A005132, A057167, A064227, A064228
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
maple: b:= proc(n) option remember; local t;
if n=0 then 0 else t:= b(n-1)-n; if t<=0 or g(t)
then t:= b(n-1)+n fi; g(t):= true; t fi
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = Module[{t}, If[n == 0, 0, t = b[n - 1] - n; If[t <= 0 || g[t], t = b[n - 1] + n]; g[t] = True; t]];
a /@ Range[0, 100] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 11 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 25 2001
ext: a(0)=0 prepended by _Allan C. Wechsler_, 08 Sep 2019
